_aArchiveFileTree: No need to readme if you don't want to.txt

_sText:
**--cs_pilko_estate--**

**---A hostage rescue map by J4CK8 and Mikeypilk---**

Pilkington Estate is a hostage map based around a German, or Italian (but german police came to the rescue) mansion. The terrorists have taken over the building and are holding the hostages...well...hostage. Counter terrorists must search the building to find the 5 hostages located in and around the mansion and return them to safety. The map consists of 2 floors and a basement.

The map was created by me with help and ideas from Mikeypilk. It uses various custom textures take from the "Textures for the Real world" pack by TopHATTwaffle (http://www.gamebanana.com/members/144386) and some textures created by myself and Mikeypilk

The map includes:
-18 Spawn points per team
-Buyzones for both teams
-5 Hostages
-Custom materials
-Custom radar (Works but is limited*)
-Working nav file
-3d skybox

*As the map features 2 floors, the radar cannot display both floors and therefore will only display the top floor.

This is a new version of previously named cs_mansion. This updated version includes some more details here and there, a new basement entrance from ct spawn and new textures on the building. Some other bugs and fixes also included.


To install, extract the .BSP files to your cstrike/maps folder.
